snippet.title: Technotopia | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Technotopia is a city-builder roguelike card game. Assume the role of an artificial intelligence tasked with crafting an ideal city that caters to all inhabitants. Construct various districts, address urban dilemmas, fulfill faction requests, and brace yourself for obstacles, all while considering the diverse needs and issues of the populace. Join the playtest now!

Playtest now on Steam: https://s.team/a/2825110
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/alawar
